IMAGE_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML: This only shows icons named exactly “{{name}}”. Try Searching to find more icons with similar names.
IMAGE_PAGE.TITLE: {{name}} Tiny Icon

IMAGES_PAGE.TITLE: Most Common Icons
IMAGES_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML:
These are the {{numValues, addCommas}} most common icons.
  • {{imageCount, addCommas}} icons
  • {{sourceCount, addCommas}} different sources
  • {{uniqueCount, addCommas}} distinct names
  • {{singleSourceCount, addCommas}} names appear in only one source.
With this many icons, I strongly recommend using the Search page to find an icon.

ALTERNATIVES_PAGE.TITLE: Alternative Icon Search Websites
ALTERNATIVES_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML: These are some vastly inferior competitors to IconSear.ch.  Use them at your own risk!

SEARCH_PAGE.TITLE: IconSear.ch: Instant icon search for SVG icons
SEARCH_PAGE.META_DESCRIPTION: Search through {{imageCount, addCommas}} SVG icons from {{sourceCount}} sources

SOURCES_PAGE.TITLE: Icon Sources
SOURCES_PAGE.INFO_BOX_HTML: Did I miss one? Let me know! If you are technically inclined, direct contributions are welcome!
